lines.text:
[Referring to the Morons]
... Commander Madison added that they were highly-intelligent and potentially dangerous...

[Interviewed by Scientists]
Oh, you must know "Take me Sideways".
So take me sideways, like you always do, it's such a la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la thing to do. My heart goes bim-bim-bim-bim-bim when I'm with you-oo.
Are you the male of your species, or...
